text: Magnus Böcker (August 31, 1961 - July 27, 2017) was a Swedish businessman. He was born in Stockholm, Sweden. He was the Executive Chairman of Blibros Capital Partners, an investment company based in Singapore and Stockholm. He was also Chairman and Co-Founder of Tryb. Böcker died at his home in Singapore of cancer on July 27, 2017 at the age of 55. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile on LinkedIn * Magnus Böcker collected news and commentary at Bloomberg * Magnus Böcker collected news and commentary at The Wall Street Journal Category:1961 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer Category:Businesspeople from Stockholm
title: Magnus Böcker
